name: Sanities Lament Prologue
description:
Help out on Greenlight - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=808246219

Notes:

First scene transition takes a bit load

If using the exe play at 1024x768 for optiminal UI.

You are trapped by a strange entity that toys with you and you must try to help your friends escape. A nightmare? A dream? Or reality?

The game is made up of two parts, the nightmare section and the visual novel section.

The visual novel section plays out like a visual novel with you and your friends trying to find out what's causing all of this. Solving puzzles and using deductive reasoning to find the perpetrator. During this time you also have to learn about who your friends really are to better help them during the nightmare.

The nightmare is an amalgumation of mechanics that come together to toy and manipulate you and your fellow classmates. Exploring the facility you've been trapped in and avoiding enemies to gain an upper hand agaisnt your captor.
